Verses: 1 aiyo! Pon Mangi, Pasumponmaari, Parisuththa Sthalaththin Karkal Sagala Veedhigalin Munaiyilum Kottundupoyitre.
2 aiyo! Thangaththukkoppaana Vilaiyerappetra Seeyon Kumaarar Kuyavanudaiya Kaivelaiyaana Manpaandangalaai Ennappadugiraargale.
3 thimingilangal Mudhalaaik Kongaigalai Neetti, Thangal Kuttigalukkup Paal Kodukkum; En Janamaagiya Kumaaraththiyo Vanaandharaththilulla Theekkuruviyaippol Kurooramaayirukkiraale.
4 kuzhandhaigalin Naavu Thaagaththaal Mel Vaayode Ottikkondirukkiradhu; Pillaigal Appanketkiraargal, Avargalukkuk Koduppaarillai.
5 rusiyaana Padhaarththangalai Saappittavargal Veedhigalil Paazhaaikkidakkiraargal; Raththaambaram Uduththi Valarndhavargal Kuppaimedugalai Anaiththuk Kollugiraargal.

6 kaichcheygai Illaamal Oru Nimishaththile Kavizhkkappatta Sodhomin Paavaththukku Vandha Thandanaiyaip Paarkkilum En Janamaagiya Kumaaraththiyin Akkiramaththukku Vandha Thandanai Peridhaayirukkiradhu.
7 avaludaiya Nasareyar Uraindha Mazhaiyaippaarkkilum Suththamum, Paalaippaarkkilum Venmaiyum, Pavalaththaippaarkkilum Sivappum, Indhiraneelaththaip Paarkkilum Meniyumaayirundhaargal.
8 ippozhudho Avargaludaiya Mugam Kariyilum Karuththuppoyitru; Veedhigalil Ariyappadaargal; Avargal Thol Avargal Elumbugalodu Ottikkondu, Kaaindha Maraththukku Oppaayitru.
9 pasiyinaal Kolaiyundavargalaip Paarkkilum Pattayaththaal Kolaiyundavargal Baakkiyavaangalaayirukkiraargal; Avargal Vayalin Varaththillaamaiyaal Kuththundu, Karaindhupogiraargal.
10 irakkamulla Sthreegalin Kaigal Thangal Pillaigalai Samaiththana, En Janamaagiya Kumaaraththiyin Azhivil Avaigal Avargalukku Aagaaramaayina.
11 karththar Thamadhu Kobaththai Niraivetri, Thamadhu Ukkirakobaththai Ootri, Seeyonil Akkiniyaik Koluththinaar; Adhu Adhin Asthibaarangalaip Patchiththuppottadhu.
12 saththuruvum Pagaignanum Erusalemin Vaasalgalukkul Pravesippaan Engiradhai Boomiyin Raajaakkalum Poochchakkaraththin Sagala Kudigalum Nambamaattaadhirundhaargal.
13 adhin Naduvil Needhimaangalin Raththaththai Sindhina Adhin Theerkkadharisigalin Paavangalinaalum, Adhin Aasaariyargalin Akkiramangalinaalum Ippadi Vandhadhu.
14 kurudarpola Veedhigalil Alaindhu, Oruvarum Avargal Vasthirangalaith Thodak Koodaadhapadi Raththaththaal Karaippattirundhaargal.

15 vilagungal, Theettuppattavargale, Thodaamal Vilagungal, Vilagungal, Endru Avargalai Nokkik Kooppittaargal; Meyyaaip Parandhodi Alaindhu Ponaargal; Inith Thangith Tharikkamaattaargal Endru Purajaadhigalukkulle Sollappattadhu.
16 karththarudaiya Kobam Avargalai Sidharadiththadhu, Avargalai Ini Avar Nokkaar; Aasaariyarudaiya Mugaththaip Paaraamalum Mudhiyorai Madhiyaamalumponaargal.
17 innum Engalukku Sagaayam Varumendru Naangal Veenaai Edhirpaarththirundhadhinaale Engal Kangal Pooththup Poyina; Ratchikkamaattaadha Jaadhikku Edhirpaarththukkondirundhom.
18 naangal Engal Veedhigalil Nadavaadhapadikku Engal Adichchuvadugalai Vettaiyaadinaargal; Engal Mudivu Sameebiththadhu; Engal Naatkal Niraiverippoyina; Engal Mudivu Vandhuvittadhu.
19 engalaip Pin Thodarndhavargal Aagaayaththuk Kazhugugalaippaarkkilum Vegamaayirundhaargal; Parvadhangalmel Engalaip Pin Thodarndhaargal; Vanaandharaththil Engalukkup Padhivirundhaargal.

20 karththaraal Abishegampannappattavanum, Engal Naasiyin Suvaasamaayirundhavanum Avargaludaiya Padukuzhiyil Adappattaan; Avanudaiya Nizhalile Jaadhigalukkulle Pizhaiththiruppom Endru Avanaikkuriththu Solliyirundhome.
21 oodhsthesavaasiyaagiya Edhom Kumaaraththiye, Sandhoshiththuk Kalikooru; Paaththiram Unnidaththirkum Thaandivarum, Appozhudhu Nee Veriththu, Maanabangamaaik Kidappaai.

22 seeyon Kumaaraththiye, Un Akkiramaththukku Varum Thandanai Theerndhadhu; Avar Ini Unnai Appuram Siraippattuppogavidaar; Edhom Kumaaraththiye, Un Akkiramaththai Avar Visaarippaar; Un Paavangalai Velippaduththuvaar.
